title: Carrying Capacity of a Logistic Equation
text: For a logistic equation $$y=\frac{c}{1+{ae}^{\left(-bx\right)}}$$, the carrying capacity is c.
speech: For a logistic equation  y is equal to fraction, c over, 1 plus a e raised to the parentheses negative b x,  power  , the carrying acity is c.
pacedSpeech: For a logistic equation   y is equal to fraction, c over, 1 plus a e raised to the  negative b x,  power
